meanings.sent1: She does her homework every day.
meanings.sent2: He does the dishes after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The robot does a little dance when it finishes cleaning.
meanings.sent4: The sun does its daily journey across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The wind does a gentle dance through the trees.

meanings.sent1: Eating too much sugar does cavities in your teeth.
meanings.sent2: The rain does the flowers to bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent3: His funny jokes always does laughter among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The loud noise does a panic in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The kind gesture does warmth in her heart.

meanings.definition: Is used to form questions or negatives in the present tense
meanings.sent2: He does not want to go to the party.
meanings.sent3: Why does the cat always chase the mouse?
meanings.sent4: The teacher does not tolerate late submissions.
meanings.sent5: Does the sun shine every day?
